cast.original_title: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind
cast.overview: Against all the odds, a thirteen year old boy in Malawi invents an unconventional way to save his family and village from famine.
cast.title: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind

details.biography:
Malawian Award winning actor(Film/TV/Theatre/voice), born on the first of July 1997 in Lilongwe, Malawi. Did his primary, High school and tertiary in Malawi. Joined the industry in 2013.

Primary school: Golden gate primary school

High school: Michiru view boys high school

Tertiary: SCIM

MOVIES: The boy who harnessed the wind(Netflix), Nyasaland (Joyce Mhango Chavula), Fisi (Elson Kambalu), Submerged(Brenda Mselu), Moyo wathu (Khama Mbaula), HIGHBROW (Chazz)

THEATRE: De summer Blow (Du chisiza Jnr), Valentine's( Nyasaland theatre), Mbayela (Ubumwe theatre).

ACHIEVEMENTS: Best actor award( Nasfest, 2018), Best actor nomination( M-theatre film awards, 2019).
details.name: Kelvin Maxwell Ngoma
